question: Help me plan a week-long trip to Japan, focusing on cultural experiences and local cuisine.
true_answer: Your trip to Japan includes visits to cultural sites in Kyoto and Tokyo with local culinary experiences each day.

steps.description: Find local cuisine experiences in Kyoto
Find local cuisine experiences in Tokyo

plan.current_objective: Plan a cultural and culinary trip to Japan for one week

memory_state.shared_knowledge: Kyoto: Fushimi Inari, Kiyomizu-dera; Tokyo: Senso-ji, Meiji Shrine. Culinary experiences include Kaiseki dining in Kyoto and Sushi workshops in Tokyo.

steps.content: Help me plan a week-long trip to Japan, focusing on cultural experiences and local cuisine.

Creating plan for a cultural and culinary trip to Japan: 1) Research Kyoto cultural sites 2) Find Kyoto cuisine experiences 3) Research Tokyo cultural sites 4) Find Tokyo cuisine experiences 5) Compile itinerary.
Decomposing trip plan into separate tasks for Kyoto and Tokyo cultural and cuisine research.
Assigning Kyoto cultural site research to researcher.
Searching for top cultural sites in Kyoto.
Found cultural sites: Fushimi Inari, Kiyomizu-dera, Gion District.
Marking Kyoto cultural site research complete.
Assigning Kyoto cuisine research to browser.
Looking for local cuisine experiences in Kyoto.
Found experiences: Kaiseki dining, Nishiki Market tours.
Marking Kyoto cuisine research complete.
Assigning Tokyo cultural site research to researcher.
Searching for top cultural sites in Tokyo.
Found cultural sites: Senso-ji, Meiji Shrine, Akihabara.
Marking Tokyo cultural site research complete.
Assigning Tokyo cuisine research to browser.
Looking for local cuisine experiences in Tokyo.
Found experiences: Sushi workshops, Tsukiji Outer Market visits.
Marking Tokyo cuisine research complete.
Suggest combining cultural site visits with nearby dining options for a seamless itinerary.
Updating plan with integrated cultural and culinary experiences per day.
Your trip to Japan includes visits to cultural sites in Kyoto and Tokyo with local culinary experiences each day.
Archiving final itinerary and key highlights for future reference.
